events.name: Lithium-ion Recycling
events.wd_description: Methods for recycling lithium-ion batteries including pyrometallurgical, hydrometallurgical, bioleaching, and direct recycling.
events.description: Methods for recycling lithium-ion batteries including pyrometallurgical, hydrometallurgical, bioleaching, and direct recycling.

events.name: Pyrometallurgy
events.wd_description: Employs extreme heat to transform metal oxides into cobalt, copper, iron, and nickel alloys.
events.description: Employs extreme heat to transform metal oxides into cobalt, copper, iron, and nickel alloys.

events.name: Hydrometallurgy
events.wd_description: Uses aqueous solutions to leach targeted metals out from the cathode substance.
events.description: Uses aqueous solutions to leach targeted metals out from the cathode substance.

events.name: Bioleaching
events.wd_description: Uses bacteria to retrieve precious metals.
events.description: Uses bacteria to retrieve precious metals.

events.name: regional supply security
events.wd_description: The level of cobalt supply security varies by region, with some regions more vulnerable to supply risks.
events.description: The level of cobalt supply security varies by region, with some regions more vulnerable to supply risks.

events.name: China
events.wd_description: China is expected to have a high cobalt supply risk due to its booming domestic EV market and reliance on overseas resources.
events.description: China is expected to have a high cobalt supply risk due to its booming domestic EV market and reliance on overseas resources.

events.name: EU and U.S.
events.wd_description: The EU and U.S. have relatively high cobalt supply security due to outsourcing battery production and controlling overseas cobalt mines.
events.description: The EU and U.S. have relatively high cobalt supply security due to outsourcing battery production and controlling overseas cobalt mines.

events.name: Japan
events.wd_description: Japan faces higher cobalt supply risks due to limited domestic reserves and overseas reserve ownership.
events.description: Japan faces higher cobalt supply risks due to limited domestic reserves and overseas reserve ownership.

relations.wd_description: qualifies something (inception or end of a thing, event, or date) as happening previously to another thing
